pages.text: The $(l)Casting Ring$()- is an item that allows casting spells without your wand in hand.$(br) The Casting Ring doesn't use wand mana, only your Mana Pool mana. $(br)To use, first equip the Casting Ring and put your wand anywhere in inventory.
Next, set a casting key in your keyboard control settings to cast spells. When using, you can switch spells the same way you do with a wand.
